scenarios.name: The Greatest Job in the World

10.1: Move traps in %game.mapMarker.1% one hex downward
10.2: Move traps in %game.mapMarker.2% one hex closer to nearest character

14.1: one for every normal Giant Viper and two for every elite Giant Viper adjacent to a Zealot, the Giant Viper dies

15.1: one for every Black Imp within Range 3 of a Zealot which then gain %game.condition.stun%

20.1: Loot is represented with Objectives, after looting exhaust corresponding Objective to find good

21.1: in any hex the last objective was destroyed
21.2: Characters suffer %game.damage:[L/2{$math.floor}]% for each hex they enter in room of Chaos Demon %game.mapMarker.A%

giant-viper.1: All attacks targeting %data.monster.giant-viper% gain Disadvantage this round.
giant-viper.2: Add +2 %game.action.attack% if the target is adjacent to any of the %data.monster.giant-viper%'s allies.

giant-viper-scenario-21.1: Each time after any figure attacks a Giant Viper, that figure suffers %game.damage:L%

black-sludge.1: The closest enemy in line-of-sight, regardless of range, suffer [1+L/2{$math.ceil}] %game.damage%

chaos-demon.1: Any time a figure attacks the %data.monster.chaos-demon% this round, that figure suffer %game.damage:2%
chaos-demon.2: All enemies adjacent to the target suffer %game.damage:1%

living-corpse.2: If this movement is performed, the %data.monster.living-corpse% suffers %game.damage:1%.
living-corpse.3: If this attack is performed, the %data.monster.living-corpse% suffers %game.damage:1%.

monstrosity.1: If this attack is performed, the %data.monster.monstrosity% suffers %game.damage:1%.
monstrosity.2: Add +1 %game.action.attack% if the target is adjacent to any of the %data.monster.monstrosity%'s allies.
monstrosity.3: Any time a figure attacks the %data.monster.monstrosity% this round, that figure suffers %game.damage:2%.

stone-golem.1: Any time a figure attacks the %data.monster.stone-golem% this round, that figure suffers %game.damage:3%.
stone-golem.2: If the Move ability was performed, the %data.monster.stone-golem% suffers %game.damage:1%.
stone-golem.3: If this attack is performed, the %data.monster.stone-golem% suffers %game.damage:2%.

vermling-raider.1: Create one 3-%game.damage% trap in an adjacent empty hex closest to an enemy.

zealot.1: X is %game.damage% suffered by target of attack

blood-horror.1: Jump to farthest dead %data.monster.zealot% and revive or jump to farthest character and %game.action.attack%+0

blood-monstrosity.1: On death, all adjacent figures suffer %game.damage:1%

basic-vermling-raider.1: Shuffle this deck at the end of the round.
basic-vermling-raider.2: They will move to avoid being adjacent to their focus.
basic-vermling-raider.3: They are not moving this round.
basic-vermling-raider.4: This is exactly how they acted last scenario.

giant-viper.1: Alle Angriffe an %data.monster.giant-viper% erhalten in dieser Runde Nachteil.
giant-viper.2: Fge +2 %game.action.attack% wenn das Ziel an einer %data.monster.giant-viper%'s Verbndeten angrenzt.

black-sludge.1: Der nchste Gegner in Sichtline, ungachtet der Reichweite, erleidet %game.damage:[1+L/2{$math.ceil}]%.

chaos-demon.1: Jedesmal wenn eine Figur den %data.monster.chaos-demon% in dieser Runde angreift, erleidet die Figur %game.damage:2%.
chaos-demon.2: Alle an das Ziel angrenzenden Gegner erleiden %game.damage:1%.

living-corpse.2: Falls eine Bewegung ausgefhrt wird, erleidet die %data.monster.living-corpse% %game.damage:1%.
living-corpse.3: Falls ein Angriff ausgefhrt wird, erleidet die %data.monster.living-corpse% %game.damage:1%.

monstrosity.1: Falls dieser Angriff ausgefhrt wird, erleidet die %data.monster.monstrosity% %game.damage:1%.
monstrosity.2: Fge +1 %game.action.attack% hinzu falls das Ziel an einen Verbndeten der %data.monster.monstrosity% angrenzt.
monstrosity.3: Jede Figur die die %data.monster.monstrosity% diese Runde angreift erleidet %game.damage:1%.

stone-golem.1: Jede Figur die den %data.monster.stone-golem% diese Runde angreift erleidet %game.damage:3%.
stone-golem.2: Falls diese Beweung ausgefhrt wird erleidet der %data.monster.stone-golem% %game.damage:1%.
stone-golem.3: Falls dieser Angriff ausgefhrt wird erleidet der %data.monster.stone-golem% %game.damage:2%.

vermling-raider.1: Erstelle eine %game.damage:3% Falle in einem an das Ziel angrenzenden freiem Feld.

zealot.1: X ist der durch den Angriff erlittene Schaden des Ziels.

blood-horror.1: Springe zum am weitesten entfernen toten %data.monster.zealot% und belebe diesen wieder oder springe zum am weitesten entfernten Charakter und fhre %game.action.attack%+0 aus.

blood-monstrosity.1: Bei Tod: alle angrenzenden Figuren erleiden %game.damage:1%.

rat-monstrosity.1: Bei Tod: alle angrenzenden Figuren erleiden %game.damage:1%.
rat-monstrosity.2: Bei Tod: alle angrenzenden Figuren erleiden %game.damage:2%.
rat-monstrosity.3: Bei Tod: alle angrenzenden Figuren erleiden %game.damage:3%.
rat-monstrosity.4: Bei Tod: alle angrenzenden Figuren erleiden %game.damage:4%.

basic-vermling-raider.1: Mische diese Karten am Ende der Runde.
basic-vermling-raider.2: Werden sich bewegen um zu vermeiden an ihren Fokus anzugrenzen.
basic-vermling-raider.4: Dies ist dasselbe Verhalten wie im vorherigen Szenario.

scenario.Roadside Ambush: Embuscade au Bord de la Route

giant-viper.1: Toutes les attaques ciblant la Vipre Gante ce round gagnent Dsavantage.
giant-viper.2: Ajoute +2 %game.action.attack% si la cible est adjacente  un alli de la Vipre Gante.

black-sludge.1: L'adversaire en ligne de vue le plus proche, sans considration de porte, subit %game.damage:[1+L/2{$math.ceil}]%.

chaos-demon.1: Chaque fois qu'un personnage attaque le %data.monster.chaos-demon%, ce personnage subit %game.damage:2%.
chaos-demon.2: Tous les adversaires adjacents  la cible subissent 1 dgt.

living-corpse.2: Si le dplacement est effectu, le %data.monster.living-corpse% subit 1 dgt.
living-corpse.3: Si cette attaque est effectue, le %data.monster.living-corpse% subit 1 dgt.

monstrosity.1: Si cette attaque est effectue, la %data.monster.monstrosity% subit 1 dgt.
monstrosity.2: Ajoute +1 %game.action.attack% si la cible est adjacente  un alli de la %data.monster.monstrosity%.
monstrosity.3: Chaque fois qu'un personnage attaque la %data.monster.monstrosity%, ce personnage subit %game.damage:2%.

stone-golem.1: Chaque fois qu'un personnage attaque le %data.monster.stone-golem% this round, ce personnage subit %game.damage:3%.
stone-golem.2: Si le dplacement est effectu, le %data.monster.stone-golem% subit 1 dgt.
stone-golem.3: Si cette attaque est effectue, le %data.monster.stone-golem% subit %game.damage:2%.

vermling-raider.1: Cre un pige  %game.damage:3% sur l'hexagone vide adjacent le plus proche d'un adversaire.

zealot.1: X est le montant des dgts subit pas la cible de l'attaque.

blood-horror.1: Saute jusqu'au %data.monster.zealot% mort le plus loign et le ressuscite OU Saute jusqu' l'aventurier le plus loign et %game.action.attack% +0.

blood-monstrosity.1: sa mort, tous les personnages adjacents subissent 1 dgt.

rat-monstrosity.1: sa mort, tous les personnages adjacents subissent 1 dgt.
rat-monstrosity.2: sa mort, tous les personnages adjacents subissent %game.damage:2%.
rat-monstrosity.3: sa mort, tous les personnages adjacents subissent %game.damage:3%.
rat-monstrosity.4: sa mort, tous les personnages adjacents subissent %game.damage:4%.

basic-vermling-raider.1: Mlangez ce paquet  la fin du round.
basic-vermling-raider.2: Ils se dplaceront pour viter d'tre adjacents  leur adversaire en focus.
basic-vermling-raider.3: Ins ne se dplacent pas ce round.
basic-vermling-raider.4: Ils ont agi exactement de la mme faion dans le dernier scnario.

demolitionist.1: Tous les adversaires adjacents subissent 1 dgt.

15.1: Spawn Black Imps adjacent to revealed tables.
15.2: Each Zealot kills one Black Imp within %game.action.range:3% and gains %game.condition.stun%. Spwan elite Blood Imps.
